Index.slogan: <important>Unite</important> Crypto, <important>Boost</important> your Returns, and <important>Defend</important> from Volatility with <important>UNIT</important> - the <important>First Unbiased Unit of Account</important>.
Index.unit-algorithm: A dynamic, algorithmic set of decentralized cryptocurrencies produces UNIT (Ø), an unbiased, crypto-native unit of account. Our vaults and farms are now in Beta.
Index.channel-intro: The crypto industry is becoming increasingly fragmented. A fundamental way to unite crypto is for the crypto space to adopt an <important>unbiased unit of account</important>.
Index.manage-fund-desc: Managing your own crypto index fund would accrue many trading and gas fees, while owning UNIT does all of this for you at <important>no cost</important>.
Index.borrow-unit-desc: By borrowing UNIT, a participant can now act on <important>the whole crypto market</important>. A buyer of UNIT can now hold a coin that represents the whole market instead of an individual currency, <important>cutting the risk of exposure</important> to bugs in any specific coin.
Index.blog-desc: 2ØY is the organization working to <important>unite crypto</important> through The UNIT and <important>expand crypto</important> through Blocktree (coming next).

About.title: About The UNIT
About.about-the-unit:
A list of <important>top cryptocurrencies</important> creates UNIT. UNIT is both the <important>first unbiased unit of account</important> and <important>crypto's first unbiased benchmark</important>. 

We foresee a future where people no longer depend on central banks’ fiat currency as the value benchmark. As we journey further into an era of increasing <important>decentralization</important> and <important>disintermediation</important>, we believe that an unbiased standard is emerging and that standard is <important>UNIT</important>. 

Since UNIT is a pure unit of account and <important>not a currency</important>, we created <important>TINU</important>, the first token pegged to the value of the benchmark. To mint TINU, enter our <important>vaults</important>, and boost your returns with UN rewards using our <important>farms</important>.
About.ans-what-is-the-unit: <important>UNIT</important> is an unbiased unit of account created from a set of cryptocurrencies coming from an <docsSelectionCriteria>Open Selection Criteria</docsSelectionCriteria> and glued together through an <docsAlgorithm>Open Algorithm</docsAlgorithm> that includes the <important>total human population</important> and the <important>average life expectancy at birth</important>.
About.ans-what-is-unit: <important>TINU</important> is a token <important>pegged</important> to <important>UNIT</important> that can only be issued through our vaults. Its name comes from reversing the order of the letters in UNIT and contains the magical word inu.
About.ans-is-unit-money:
Money has taken many forms through the ages, but it consistently has <important>three functions</important>: unit of account, medium of exchange, and store of value. None of the cryptocurrencies that exist today achieve all three aspects.

UNIT aims at fulfilling the <important>unit of account function of money</important> but not the other two. Once the crypto space grows enough to serve as the world's financial system, UNIT can also be a <important>standard for deferred payments</important> which is a subfunction of a unit of account.
About.ans-what-features-the-unit: Unlike all previous units of account, <important>UNIT</important> is not primarily a currency; it is an unbiased unit derived from the most important cryptocurrencies. In this way, UNIT doesn't choose winners or losers and instead <important>focuses on the most important portion</important> of the fungible decentralized cryptocurrency market.
About.faq-what-features-unit: UNIT is the First Just Unit of Account, what does "Just" here mean?
About.ans-what-features-unit: The term "Just" in this context carries two meanings. Firstly, it implies that <important>UNIT</important> is an <important>unbiased unit of account</important>. Secondly, it refers to <important>UNIT</important> only being a <important>pure unit</important>. It's not a currency, instead, it provides a steady benchmark in the crypto world.
